issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Cloudformations is currently responding with an XML response rather than JSON when ContentType is set to JSON in the request. This causes boto to blow up on all requests.
fields.summary: CloudFormations need to return JSON response with ContentType==JSON
